title: Chief Technology Officer
details: Developed SpineSight, an AI platform automating MRI measurements and reducing diagnostic time by 85%.

title: Lead AI Scientist & Research Director
details: Led team of 20+ students on 15+ AI research projects, creating 3 clinical software prototypes used in Mount Sinai workflows.

title: AI Panelist

Topics Covered: Prostate Cancer Surgery | Incorporating Large AI Databases in Healthcare | Integration of LLM in Urologic Care and Research | AI and 3D Models for Surgical Navigation During Robotic Radical Prostatectomy

title: Course Director

details: Taught AI to 50+ medical students via coding workshops and F500 speaker-series lectures.
